name: Salami of the Month Club - From $140
description:
Olympic Provisions makes 12 different salamis crafted from all-natural northwest pork using Old World techniques. This lends itself well to our Salami of the Month club, which ensures that members try one of these delicious salamis each month for a year, delivered right to their door. 

Purchaser can decide whether the lucky recipient gets either 1, 2, or 3 of each month's featured salami, which ships the second Tuesday of the month.  Included with the salami are detailed tasting notes and examples of how Salumist Elias Cairo likes to enjoy it. If you purchase a gift membership, the object of your meaty affection receives a welcome letter letting them know they are now a part of the Salami of the Month Club, who purchased it for them, what salami they'll be gifted with each month, and when to expect delivery (so they can be waiting at the door). Includes shipping and can be shipped anywhere in America.

options.name: 1 Salami Per Month, with Red Gift Box, Cutting Board, and Knife delivered w/ 1st order

3 Salami Per Month, with Wood Gift Box, Cutting Board, and Knife delivered w/ 1st order

name: Steven Smith Father's Day Pairing- $39.99
description:
This year Tea Maker, Steven Smith and Salumist, Elias went through a rigorous tasting and have come up the the perfect pairing of our Loukanika and Chorizo Rioja with Steven Smith’s robust Brahmin and Exceptional Iced Tea.

Chorizo Rioja (chor-IZ-oh ri-OH-ha) is a Spanish-style salami with both sweet & smoked paprika, garlic & oregano.

Loukanika (loo-KAH-nik-ah) is a Greek salami flavored with equal parts garlic & cumin, and a touch of orange zest.

Brahmin is a rich blend of full-bodied Indian Assam teas paired with succulent Ceylon Dimbulla, intense and floral Ceylon Uva and a touch of smoky China Keemun from Anhui.

Exceptional Iced Tea is a highly invigorating blend of full leaf Assam and Ceylon black teas chosen for their ability to create a more elevated iced tea experience. Tastes especially cool in dark glasses.



2 Salami at 4.5 ounces and 10 QUART-SIZED SACHETS OF EXCEPTIONAL ICED TEA, AND 1 TIP TOP CARTON OF BRAHMIN SACHETS.

name: Salami Bouquet ($50-$120) -INCLUDES SHIPPING & 3 or 6 SALAMI
description:
Impress and amaze your loved one with an Olympic Provisions Salami Bouquet. 


Offered in 3 ($50-$85 depending on shipping option) and 6 ($85-$120 depending on shipping option) stem bouquets. Please let us know what you want the card to say!

Shipping is included in price.  

PLEASE NOTE THAT WE TAKE 1 BUSINESS DAY TO FILL ORDERS AND YOU HAVE THE OPTION TO SELECT OVERNIGHT, 2 DAY AIR, OR PRIORITY.  WE DO NOT GUARANTEE PRIORITY MAIL ARRIVAL TIMES.

name: Olympic Provisions Royale  - From $125
description:
Delight and amazed your loved ones with a sampler that includes our entire line of salami in a beautiful gift box. Sampler includes all 12 of our salamis based on the flavor profiles of France, Spain, Italy, and even Greece.

3 French: Saucisson Sec (garlic, black pepper), Saucisson d'Arles (no added seasoning- just beautiful pork), Saucisson d'Alsace (cinnamon, clove, nutmeg)

4 Italian: Finnochiona (fennel, garlic), Nola (allspice, chili flake), Sopressata (garlic, chili flake, clove), Cacciatore (caraway, corriander)  

4 Spanish: Chorizo Andalucia (paprika, clove), Chorizo Rioja (paprika, oregano), Chorizo Navarre (paprika, cayenne), Spanish Salchichon (paprika, sweet baking spices)

1 Greek: Loukanika (cumin, orange zest)

Option to complete your salami gift with a perfect compliment of a beautiful Bamboo cutting board, a French Opinel knife, and a custom gift box.

name: French Charcuterie Fete - $125 (Includes UPS Shipping)
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK.  ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.


Treat yourself or guests to our artisan French charcuterie.  This party includes our trio of pork liver mousse, pork rillettes, and country style pork pistachio pâte as well as our 3 French saucissons, and our French dessert salami. 

Pork Liver Mousse: Rich and creamy mousse of pork liver slightly sweetened with Port Wine and capped with lard.

Pork Pistachio Pâte: Country style pork pâte with fresh herbs, pistachios, and capped with lard.

Pork Rillettes: Tender hand chopped pork shoulder slow cooked in pork fat with warm baking spices of ginger and thyme.

Saucisson D’Alsace: An Alsatian pub salami flavored with clove, nutmeg, allspice & cinnamon.

Saucisson D’Arles:  Our most simple and classic: just pork & salt.

Saucisson Sec:  Traditional French salami flavored with garlic & black pepper.

Saucisson Au Chocolat: Dark chocolate ganache with a hint of warm baking spices, nuts, candied ginger, and red wine.

Collection includes: Three 8-oz. package of pate, three 4.5 oz. pork salami, and One 5 oz. Chocolate Salami; 2.65 lb. total weight.

Shipped chilled UPS Shipping 2 Day Air.

name: Pâte Sampler* -  From $57 (Includes 2 Day UPS Shipping)
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK.  ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.

Treat yourself or guests to our artisan French pâte with this trio of pork liver mousse, pork rillettes, and country style pork pistachio pâte. 

Pork Liver Mousse: Rich and creamy mousse of pork liver slightly sweetened with Port Wine and capped with rendered pig fat.  

Pork Pistachio Pâte: Country style pork pâte with fresh herbs, pistachios, and capped with rendered pig fat. 

Pork Rillettes: Tender hand chopped pork shoulder slow cooked in pork fat with warm baking spices of ginger and thyme.

Collection includes one 8-oz. package of each flavor; 1.5 lb. total weight.

Shipped chilled.

name: Spanish Sampler  - From $40
description:
At Olympic Provisions we make 3 Spanish style chorizos inspired by the regions of Andalucia, Navarre, and Rioja.  This sampler allows you to take a culinary journey of Spain.

Included in this sampler:

Chorizo Rioja (chor-IZ-oh ri-OH-ha) is a Spanish-style salami with both sweet & smoked paprika, garlic & oregano.

Chorizo Navarre (chor-IZ-oh nah-VAR) is flavored with sweet paprika, garlic & cayenne.

Chorizo Andalucia (chor-IZ-oh anda-LOO-chee-AH) is flavored with paprika, garlic & clove.

Salchichon (sahl-CHEE-chahn) is a Spanish-style festival salami with cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, black pepper, garlic & paprika.

 Each salami is approximately 4.5 ounces.

name: French Salami Sampler - From $30
description:
Take a Tour de France with our 3 French salamis.

Included in this bundle: 

Saucisson D’Alsace (Saw-sis-SAHN DE-al-SAHS) is an Alsatian pub salami flavored with clove, nutmeg, allspice & cinnamon.

Saucisson D’Arles (saw-sis-SAHN DEH-ahurls) is elemental, pure & simple: just pork & salt.

Saucisson Sec (Saw-sis-SAHN SEK) is a traditional French salami flavored with garlic & black pepper.

Each salami is approximately 4.5 ounces.

Option to complete your salami gift with a perfect compliment of a beautiful Bambu cutting board, a French Opinel knife, and a custom gift box.

name: Italian Salami Sampler - From $40
description:
This sampler pack includes four of our Italian inspired salami :

Cacciatore (Kah-chuh-TOR-aye) is the classic Italian hunter’s salami with caraway, coriander, dried red chili & black pepper.

Finocchiona (fin-OHK-ee-own-ah) is a traditional Italian salami with garlic, black pepper & fennel.

Salami Nola (NO-lah) is a course-ground Italian salami with black pepper, chili flake & allspice.

Sopressata (sow-press-SAH-tah) is a classic Italian salami with clove, oregano, garlic & chili flake.


Each salami is approximately 4.5 ounces

name: Chocolate Salami Sampler - $30.00
description:
Treat yourself or guests to our artisan French, Italian and Spanish chocolate salami.

Saucisson Au Chocolat- French style chocolate ganache with warm baking spices, pumpkin seeds, nuts, candied ginger, and red wine.

Salchichon De Chocolat: Spanish style chocolate ganache with a hint of smoked paprika, candied grapefruit, nuts, sherry, and a hint of heat.

Salame Di Cioccolato: Italian style chocolate ganache with candied orange peel, nuts, and grappa.

Collection includes three 5-oz. sticks of each flavor.

name: Frankfurter (includes 2 day shipping)- $34
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK. ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.


Remember the days when you would you would order a frankfurter and it hung off the bun at least two inches and when you bit into it there was a snap?  Well, welcome back to that day.  Our foot long frankfurter is pure pork shoulder cased in a a natural lamb casing and then smoked with hickory and apple wood.  

We sell them in an eight pack (wt. is 1.6 pounds).

name: Sweetheart Ham - $62  (includes 2 day air shipping)
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK.  ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.

Our little gems are made from the pork knuckle that we de-bone, place in a brine of juniper berries, fresh herbs, fresh garlic, and fresh onions for 7 days, and then we smoke them over applewood for 9 hours. 

Average size is 2.5-3 pounds. 

WARNING: Once you try this ham no other ham will taste as good!

This product is shipped in an insulated shipping container and is sent UPS 2 day air AM delivery.

name: Capicola - $77 (includes 2 day air shipping)
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK.  ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.

Also called Coppa Cotto, Capicola is made from the prized cut of the neck and shoulder. Dry-cured for ten days, it is then coated in black pepper, fennel seed, coriander and anise and slow-roasted to produce a tender shoulder ham.  

These average 2.5 Pounds

Sent UPS 2 day air AM delivery.

name: Smoked Kielbasa -$37 (Includes UPS 2 DAY SHIPPING)
description:
ALL ORDERS PLACED BY TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE SAME WEEK.  ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER TUESDAY WILL SHIP THE FOLLOWING WEEK.

Our smoked kielbasa contains 100% pork seasoned with mustard seed, garlic, and spices.  We smoke these over applewood for hours, so they have a nice smokey flavor.  

Included in this is 2 pieces (1 pound) of our kielbasa.  Product is fully cooked.  We like to slice it up and put it in a pan with our greens, so the fat and flavors season our greens.  

Option to add additional.

Product has to be sent chilled.

name: Olympic Provisions Gift Cards
description: Not sure what that special someone wants this holiday?  Purchase an Olympic Provisions Gift Card and they can use it at both restaurants!

name: Saucisson Au Chocolate
description:
Enjoy this decadent chocolate dessert salami made by Pastry Chef Amelia Lane.

The Saucisson Au Chocolat is French style dark chocolate ganache with a hint of warm baking spices, nuts, candied ginger, and red wine.

name: Cacciatore - $10
description: Cacciatore (Kah-chuh-TOR-aye) is the classic Italian hunter’s salami with caraway, coriander, dried red chili & black pepper. This cured meat is even more delicious while wearing camoflauge. Very ‘hunter chic.’ Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Chorizo Andalucia - $10
description: Chorizo Andalucia (chor-IZ-oh anda-LOO-chee-AH) is flavored with paprika, garlic & clove. Rumor has it that Don Quixote loved this salami. Does that make it Quixotic? No one knows for sure. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Chorizo Navarre - $10
description: Chorizo Navarre (chor-IZ-oh nah-VAR) is flavored with sweet paprika, garlic & cayenne. A perfect spicy accompaniment to the classical guitar of Andrés Segovia. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Chorizo Rioja - $10
description: Chorizo Rioja (chor-IZ-oh ri-OH-ha) is a Spanish-style salami with both sweet & smoked paprika, garlic & oregano. As its name implies, this salami goes great with red wine. Lots of it. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Finocchiona - $10
description: Finocchiona (fin-OHK-ee-own-ah) is a traditional Italian salami with garlic, black pepper & fennel. Named after its main flavor component (fennel), this is one of Tuscany’s oldest and most loved pork products. How could 3.6 million people be wrong? Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Loukanika - $10
description: Loukanika (loo-KAH-nik-ah) is a Greek salami flavored with equal parts garlic & cumin, and a touch of orange zest. In order to keep tradition alive, Old Man Cairo passed along this time-tested recipie to his son (and our Salumist), Eli. Who knew that pork and orange peel would play so well together? Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Salami Nola - $10
description: Salami Nola (NO-lah) is a course-ground Italian salami with black pepper, chili flake & allspice. Allspice gives a nice earthy-ness to the pork, and with a touch of chili, this salami delivers a punch despite its tiny package. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Saucisson D'Alsace - $10
description: Saucisson D’Alsace (Saw-sis-SAHN DE-al-SAHS) is an Alsatian pub salami flavored with clove, nutmeg, allspice & cinnamon. Enjoy with copious amounts of Riesling, good music & good friends. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Saucisson D'Arles - $10
description: Saucisson D’Arles (saw-sis-SAHN DEH-ahurls) is elemental, pure & simple: just pork & salt. Really, what else do you need? Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Saucisson Sec - $10
description: Saucisson Sec (Saw-sis-SAHN SEK) is a traditional French salami flavored with garlic & black pepper. As this is our most popular French-style salami, it proves the old adage, “sec sells”. Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Sopressata - $10
description: Sopressata (sow-press-SAH-tah) is a classic Italian salami with clove, oregano, garlic & chili flake. This salami has long been understood as the “salami of the people” in Italy. When in Rome... Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Spanish Salchichon - $10
description: Salchichon (sahl-CHEE-chahn) is a Spanish-style festival salami with cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, black pepper, garlic & paprika. Traditionally cured on the breezy Spanish plains, this salami transports you to simpler times. (Not literally.) Approx. 4.5 oz

name: Red Gift Box Set: Cutting Board & Knife - $40
description:
Complete your salami gift with a perfect compliment of a beautiful Bamboo cutting board, a French Opinel knife, and a custom gift box.

Opinel, is a simple, wooden-handled pocket-knife manufactured since 1890 in the town of Saint-Jean-de-Maurienne in the Savoie region of France.

Bamboo is environmentally friendly and a sustainable hardwood. Harder than maple, yet easier on knives, our Bamboo Cutting Boards are an essential for any kitchen.

name: Wood Gift Set: Knife, Cutting Board -$55
description:
Complete your salami gift with a perfect compliment of a beautiful Bamboo cutting board, a French Opinel knife, and a wood keepsake custom gift box.

Opinel, is a simple, wooden-handled pocket-knife manufactured since 1890 in the town of Saint-Jean-de-Maurienne in the Savoie region of France.

Bamboo is environmentally friendly and a sustainable hardwood. Harder than maple, yet easier on knives, our Bamboo Cutting Boards are an essential for any kitchen.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board -  $13
description:
Bamboo is environmentally friendly and a sustainable hardwood. Harder than maple, yet easier on knives, our Bamboo Cutting Boards are an essential for any kitchen.

This beautiful cutting board is the perfect size to cut your salami on!

name: Opinel Knife - $19
description:
Opinel, is a simple, wooden-handled pocket-knife manufactured since 1890 in the town of Saint-Jean-de-Maurienne in the Savoie region of France.

This traditional Opinel knife has a beechwood handle and a stainless steel (acier inox) blade.

This is a perfect kniffe to cut our salami with!

name: Wood Gift Box
description: Enjoy this custom wood box!  Handcrafted out of the great state of Idaho!

name: Red Gift Box - $10
description: This beautifuly designed gift box is perfect to turn any of our salamis into the perfect gift.
